visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain overlay (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to avoid 'digital flatness'.

rules: Never center text by default (except in Hero/Footer). Use asymmetric alignment.
Images must breathe. Use padding around images inside containers.
Overlap elements using negative margins (-mt-12) to create depth.
Use parallax scrolling on large vertical images.

buttons.primary: bg-[#0B6E4F] text-white hover:bg-[#084C3A] rounded-sm px-8 py-4 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold transition-all duration-500 ease-out
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#0B6E4F] text-[#0B6E4F] hover:bg-[#0B6E4F] hover:text-white rounded-sm px-8 py-4 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs transition-all duration-500

hero_image.alt: Close-up portrait highlighting chic gold earrings

gemstone_gallery_placeholders.ruby: Use gemstone_hero image with CSS filter: hue-rotate(280deg)
gemstone_gallery_placeholders.sapphire: Use gemstone_hero image with CSS filter: hue-rotate(180deg)
gemstone_gallery_placeholders.tanzanite: Use gemstone_hero image with CSS filter: hue-rotate(220deg)

animations.reveal: Use framer-motion. Variants: { hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 50 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.8, ease: [0.16, 1, 0.3, 1] } } }
animations.hover: Scale 1.05 on images, Letter-spacing expansion on text links.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. TYPOGRAPHY: Import 'Playfair Display' and 'Lato' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with the Lenis scroll provider.
4. COMPONENTS: Build a 'Section' wrapper that handles standard padding (py-24) and max-width.
5. NAVIGATION: Create a sticky navbar that blurs on scroll. Logo centered. Links split left/right.
6. GEMSTONE GALLERY: Implement a horizontal scroll section or a Bento grid. Use the CSS hue-rotate trick for the prototype images to distinguish Ruby/Sapphire/etc.
7. FORMS: Use Shadcn-like structure but style inputs as 'border-b' only (no rounded box).
8. COLOR: Ensure 'Deep Emerald' is used sparingly (Buttons, Key Text) against the 'Ivory' background.
9. MOBILE: Ensure images do not exceed 80vh height. Stack grids to single column.
10. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Do not center align the app container.
